answers.answer: Are you sure you arent eating badly sometimes you dont realize it. Try downloading myfitnesspal and track your food for a week then look at it.

That's good advice above about myfitnesspal. Even just keeping a food diary on paper can help to really get a grasp of any possibilities there. I'd suggest eliminating or restricting sugar especially if you haven't already. Good luck!

question: In the last 3 weeks, I've gained over 10 pounds. Last time I was at the doctor, they told me I need to watch my weight, but I'm not eating badly or being lazy. I work and go to school constantly, but I'm still gaining weight rapidly, and I feel there's nothing I can do to make it stop.
title: Rapid weight gain?
